SEARCH
Package au.csiro.pathling.fhirpath.comparison

Interface Equatable

All Known Subinterfaces:
Comparable, DateTimeComparable
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanCollection, ChoiceElementCollection, CodingCollection, Collection, DateCollection, DateTimeCollection, DecimalCollection, EmptyCollection, IntegerCollection, MixedCollection, QuantityCollection, ReferenceCollection, ResolvedReferenceCollection, ResourceCollection, StringCollection, TimeCollection
public interface Equatable
An interface for FHIRPath elements that support equality operations.
Author:
John Grimes

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static enum 
    Equatable.EqualityOperation
    Represents a type of comparison operation.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ColumnRepresentation
    getColumn()
    Returns a Column within the dataset containing the values of the nodes.
    default ColumnEquality
    getComparator()
    Gets the comparator to use for equality comparisons.
    default Function<Equatable,ColumnRepresentation>
    getElementEquality(Equatable.EqualityOperation operation)
    Get a function that can take two Equatable paths and return a ColumnRepresentation that contains an element equality condition.
    Optional<FhirPathType>
    getType()
    Gets the FHIR path type of this element if it has one.
    default boolean
    isComparableTo(Collection other)
    Determines whether this element is comparable to another collection.

  • Method Details

    • getComparator

      @Nonnull default ColumnEquality getComparator()
      Gets the comparator to use for equality comparisons.
      Returns:
      the comparator to use for equality comparisons

    • isComparableTo

      default boolean isComparableTo(@Nonnull Collection other)
      Determines whether this element is comparable to another collection.
      Parameters:
      other - the other collection
      Returns:
      true if the two collections are comparable, otherwise false

    • getElementEquality

      @Nonnull default Function<Equatable,ColumnRepresentation> getElementEquality(@Nonnull Equatable.EqualityOperation operation)
      Get a function that can take two Equatable paths and return a ColumnRepresentation that contains an element equality condition. The type of condition is controlled by supplying aEquatable.EqualityOperation.
      Parameters:
      operation - The Equatable.EqualityOperation type to retrieve the equality for
      Returns:
      A Function that takes an Equatable as its parameter, and returns a ColumnRepresentation

    • getType

      @Nonnull Optional<FhirPathType> getType()
      Gets the FHIR path type of this element if it has one.
      Returns:
      the FHIR path type of this element if it has one.

    • getColumn

      @Nonnull ColumnRepresentation getColumn()
      Returns a Column within the dataset containing the values of the nodes.
      Returns:
      A Column
